name: Vineyard Valley - A Social Winemaking Game!
blurb: Make wine from seed to bottle; build, socialize, sell, and relax in Vineyard Valley - a social, sandbox, free to play business sim!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Pledge $1 or more and receive a special in-game 'Backer!' banner which will display on your profile whenever anyone views you, along with a banner to place within your vineyard in the game, and get your name on the backers list in the game.

VINEYARD NOVICE LEVEL - Pledge $5 or more and receive an exclusive set of Vineyard Valley wallpapers for your computer, tablet, and/or smartphone!\r\n\r\nAdditionally, your name will appear in the backer credits of the game at the Vineyard Novice level.
VINEYARD THREADS LEVEL - Pledge $10 or more and receive a special set of in-game clothing that only backers will receive, along with a small bag of Vinos!

VINEYARD ASSISTANT LEVEL - Pledge $15 or more and receive a special sticker and hand written thank you note, along with everything from the Vineyard Novice level. Additionally, your name will appear in the backer credits of the game at the Vineyard Assistant level.
VINEYARD FANCY STATUE LEVEL - Back $20 or more and receive a special statue for your vineyard that only backers will receive, along with everything from the Vineyard Assistant level.

VINEYARD MANAGER LEVEL - Pledge $25 or more and receive a sack of Vinos (the in-game money) to use in the game once it is released, along with everything from the Vineyard Assistant level. Your name will also appear in the backer credits of the game at the Vineyard Manager level.
VINEYARD TINY KITTEN LEVEL - Pledge $30 or more, and receive a kitten pet that only backers will be able to get, and everything from the Vinyeard Manager Level.
VINEYARD TINY PUPPY LEVEL - Pledge $30 or more, and receive a puppy pet that only backers will be able to get, and everything from the Vinyeard Manager Level.

VINEYARD LEADER LEVEL - Pledge $35 or more and receive one additional sack of Vinos, the soundtrack to the game, and everything from the Vinyeard Manager Level. (Two Sacks of Vinos Total). Your name will also appear in the backer credits at the Vineyard Leader level.

VINEYARD VINTAGE LEVEL - Pledge $45 or more and receive a special set of backer only furniture to place in your vineyard and shopping village, along with everything from the Vineyard Leader level! Your name will also appear in the backer credits at the Vineyard Vintage level.

VINEYARD BLINGS & THINGS LEVEL - Pledge $50 or more and receive a physical set of hand-made wine charms along with everything from the Vineyard Vintage level! Your name will also appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Blings & Things Level.

VINEYARD OVERLORD LEVEL - Pledge $65 or more and have an NPC added to the game with your name (or a family-friendly non trademarked name of your choosing), along with everything from the Vineyard Blings & Things level. Your name will also appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Overlord level.

VINEYARD BETAMIND LEVEL - Pledge $100 or more and receive two additional sacks of Vinos (giving you four sacks total), and you will receive early beta access to the game - you will get to play the game before the public beta begins! You will also receive everything from the Vineyard Overlord Level, and your name will also appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Betamind level.

VINEYARD SPECIALIST LEVEL - Pledge $150 or more and receive two additional sacks of Vinos (for a total 6 sacks of Vinos), and all wine you produce in the game will be packaged in special blue backer-only bottles and barrels! You will also receive everything from the Vineyard Betamind level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Specialist level.

VINEYARD PET TRAINER LEVEL - Pledge $350 or more and receive a very special pet that only the Vineyard Pet Trainer level and higher will receive! In addition, you will also gain the permanent player boost of Good Vino Management, which will cause all Vinos you acquire in the game (whether you bought them or earned them) to be 1.5x higher than the amount earned! You will also get everything from the Vineyard Specialist level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Pet Trainer level.

VINEYARD MY-SHAPE LEVEL - Pledge $500 or more and receive an additional two sacks of Vinos (for a total 8 sacks of Vinos), and you will get to specify the shape of your wine bottles which NOBODY ELSE IN THE ENTIRE GAME BUT YOU will have (must not be a copyrighted or trademarked shape). You will also get to define the color of the bottles - be it the Backer Blue color or anything else (and the color will be permanent for your bottles)! In addition you will receive everything from the Vineyard Pet Trainer level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard My-Shape level.

VINEYARD CONVERSATION LEVEL - Pledge $750 or more and and you will be invited to be part of a special Skype call to discuss the game with the designers and developers of Vineyard Valley, a call that only backers at the Vineyard Conversation level and higher will be able to participate in! You will also receive everything from the Vineyard My-Shape level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Conversation level.

VINEYARD BOTANIST LEVEL - Pledge $1,000 or more and receive three more sacks of Vinos (giving you 11 total sacks of Vinos), and a custom fruit in the game that you design and name! It doesn't even need to be a real fruit - however it will be added to the game as something any player can grow, and will be a required component in very special wines! You will also receive everything from the Vineyard Conversation level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Botanist level.

VINEYARD MOBILITY LEVEL -  Pledge $1,500 or more and receive an Android Tablet etched with the logo of the game and graphically themed after Vineyard Valley!  You will also receive everything from the Vineyard Botanist level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Mobility level.

VINEYARD DOUBLE-DUTY LEVEL - Pledge $2000 or more, and receive the player boost of 'Vino Doubler' - every Vino you acquire in the game (be it earned or purchased) will earn 2x the amount you acquired! You will also receive 4 more sacks of Vinos (for a total 15 sacks of Vinos). You will also get everything from the Vineyard Mobility level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Double-Duty level.

VINEYARD JUST GIVE IT TO ME LEVEL - Pledge $4000 or more and we will make the game always free for you. After this pledge, you will never have to spend any actual money in the game, and will get a constant steady monthly supply of Vinos as a thank you for backing us with such a pledge! You will also receive everything from the Vineyard Double-Duty level, and your name will appear in the credits at the Vineyard Just Give It To Me level.

VINEYARD DESIGNER LEVEL - Pledge $5,000 or more and receive an all-expenses paid 2 day / 1 night trip to Colorado for you and one friend to have dinner with the lead designer of Vineyard Valley! And if that's not enough, you will get to sit with the lead designer and plan something new entirely of your design for the game! Design what? That's up to you! We'll work with you to make sure it fits within the game, but in the end it will be entirely yours to point at and say, "Yup. I did that!". In addition, you will receive everything from the Vineyard Just Give It To Me level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Designer level.\r\n\r\nNOTE: Even though we have a $35 international shipping fee, if you are from another country the shipping details may end up being higher for this tier depending on the cost of plane tickets to fly you here and back. You will also be entirely responsible for your own passports and any other international travel requirements.

VINEYARD ULTIMATE VACATION LEVEL - This is the big one. This is the trip of a lifetime! Pledge $9,950 or more and receive an all expenses paid 3 day / 2 night trip to Colorado Wine Country for you and one friend! You will get to stay at a bed and breakfast, and will be escorted to the various wineries, meaderies, absent distillers - anywhere wine or alcohol related that allows tours. We will design a gameplan of places to attend and tour, however if there are places not on your list you wish to attend we will make sure you get to see them! We will even accompany you on these tours and we can spend the entire weekend discussing Vineyard Valley. You will also get to have a special dinner with the lead designer of Vineyard Valley, and will get to sit and help design something entirely of your choosing - no matter what it is, and we'll help to make sure it fits within the game. You will also receive everything at the Vineyard Designer level, and your name will appear in the Backer Credits at the Vineyard Ultimate Vacation level. And since there is only one of this tier available - your name will be alone shining bright as the sole person who backed at this level and got these awesome rewards. Now that's something to brag about!

NOTE 1: You MUST be 21 years of age or older to accept this backer level due to the fact we will be touring wineries!


NOTE 2: Even though we have a $35 international shipping fee, if you are from another country the shipping details may end up being higher for this tier depending on the cost of plane tickets to fly you here and back. You will also be entirely responsible for your own passports and any other international travel requirements.
